qas.question: When did Moroccan Sultan Moulay Ismail live?
How many black slaves did he own?
What did he call his slave army?
What did the Black Guard do?
When did the Black Guard exist?

context: <a4_0>In the 18th century<a4_0/>, the Moroccan Sultan Moulay Ismail "the Bloodthirsty" <a0_0>(1672–1727)<a0_0/> raised a corps of <a1_0>150,000<a1_0/> black slaves, called his <a2_0>Black Guard<a2_0/>, who <a3_0>coerced the country into submission.
